name: RelationExpertSystem
short_description: An Expert System developed in Visual Studio 2010 using .NET 4.0 and employing the Microsoft Windows Workflow Foundation (WWF) Business Rules Engine (BRE) to implement a Relation Expert System.  A ruleset file for relations is included, as are two .people fact files.  Given a set of people, each with Name, Sex, Mother, Father, and Spouse defined, the system uses forward-chaining to infer all other relations between two people.
summary: A forward-chaining expert system in .NET using MS WWF BRE
